name: Ascend (Mistful)
description:
A metroidvania game made for University of Arizona's Game Dev Club fall 2017 Game Jam.  The theme of the game jam was alchemy.  We based our game off of the great chain of being which was the basis for alchemy in medieval Europe.

wasd or arrow keys to move. 

jump on top of enemies to defeat them.

Creators:

Isaac - Lead Programmer

Devon - Lead Game Designer/Programmer

Lillie - Game Designer / Programmer

Tene - Artist

Vicente - Composer
